page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Policing of the area is carried out by a Police Constable, who lives in the local Police House, within the village. There he has his own office, from which he works, but no cells. His area covers almost 15 square miles surrounding Godshill, taking in other smallvillages. This he patrols on a motorcycle, which has a 2-way VHF radio so that he is in constant touch with his base station of Shanklin, from where he can call on the assistance of other officers when needed. His duties include dealing with the large influx of summer visitors and traffic to the village, as well as his more normal duties of visiting farms, and with his close local knowledge, dealing with crime, traffic accidents and other matters.
